xprop.longdesc:
This beautiful and spacious home with four bedrooms and 2,400 square feet is more than enough room to enjoy a relaxing or adventurous getaway. The gorgeous view from the large balcony, with ample room to relax and sun-bathe, would make one believe they were in a dream. With two living rooms, one upstairs and one downstairs, parents can enjoy a comfortable and quiet afternoon while the children can watch their favorite movie and play adventurous games all at the same time. When those activities die down, enjoy a barbecue on the balcony with the amazing view or go fishing and maybe even catch dinner for the evening picnic. Play catch on the 75 feet of rolling sandy beach down by the water or curl up by the cozy fireplace. At night enjoy the luxury of a family bonfire and maybe swim by the light of the moon. The options and memories to be made are endless at the Calling of the Huron. xprop.longdesc:
Welcome to a perfect vacation cottage that is a master at making memories. The AuSable River Home has 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms and the space to sleep 6 people. For adamant animal lovers, your cute ball of fur can take their much needed time off too. This charming cottage is adorned by 200 feet of AuSable River front, which is perfect for fishing or to just watch ducks float by. Since you would already be relaxing outside, why not do it on the covered sun porch that faces the river? Or in the whirl pool spa that is part of the porch? Relaxation can be found indoors as well. The house offers adequate lounging space around one of the 2 gas fireplaces. For someone looking to explore locally on their vacation, Lumberman's Monument or Iargo Springs could offer some adventure. Both have beautiful scenery and are abundant in local history. Find the softer side of life at the AuSable River Home.

Willow Beach is the perfect area for a small family reunion or a larger family vacation! With a main home and three smaller rustic cabins, a family get-together is easily accessible. Children will love the ample room to play in the grassy backyard and on a beautiful sandy beach.  Lake Huron is perfect for swimming and fishing. Imagine having all your family in the same area, laughing while enjoying dinner together and reminiscing on the deck from the main home.  Lots of room for everyone!  Willow Beach is conveniently located in Tawas close to shopping and the biking path that runs from Alabaster Road (Tawas city area) to Tawas Point Lighthouse in East Tawas.

The main home and cabins have cable and WIFI. The main home sleeps 8 (home is open all year round) and each cabin sleeps 4 (cabins are closed each year after October 15th).

Cabin amenities: 1 bedroom, 1 bath, with futon, TV in living room area , NEW air conditioning units, microwave, NEW mini refrigerators (as of 2016 full size fridges removed), pots, pans, dishes and a hot plate to cook on (no stove or oven)

xprop.amenlist: Amenities:|Fireplace Type-Gas|Linens|Towels|Wi-Fi|General Amenities:|Furniture Type-Sofa bed|Outdoor Grill- Charcoal|Outdoor Shower|Phone-House|Small Appliances-Blender|Small Appliances-Coffee Pot|Small Appliances-Microwave|Small Appliances-Toaster|TV Type - Basic Cable|VCR/DVD|Kitchen / Dining:|Dishes Utensils|Kitchen|Local:|Access to Park|Near State Park|Outdoor:|Fire pit|Hammock|Lawn Chairs|Picnic Table|Suitability:|Pets Considered|Smoking Not Allowed
xprop.ratesinfo: Base Rate + 6% Sales Tax + $75 Cleaning Fee
xprop.longdesc:
Charming family cottage located on Tawas Point, just a stroll around to Tawas Point State Park and one of the most incredible white sand beaches we've ever seen. View glorious sunrises or amazing sunsets just a stroll away. The interior of this 1,000+ sqaure foot gem is glowing knotty pine with family room, living room, 2 bedrooms, 1 full bath with shower and tub, full kitchen, and it sleeps 6. Outside in the private backyard you'll enjoy a bonfire pit, charcoal grill, picnic table and hammock. Downtown East Tawas is only 4 miles away with a paved path all the way for biking/running/walking/rollerblading. Enjoy restaurants, movies, boutique stores, ice cream, the pier, etc. The Au Sable River is only a 15-minute drive for canoeing, kayaking, tubing and fishing. If you want to bring your boat or rent one, the marina is only a few blocks away. Launch your boat for the day or rent a slip for the week. Don't forget to walk up the beach to see the Lighthouse and check out the amazing kite boarding and world-class birding. This is the spot for relaxing and recreating! You won't want to leave!!!

Monthly Off Season Upon Approval

xprop.longdesc:
This cute and cozy 750 square foot cottage located right in town is the perfect spot for watching the beautiful fireworks display in July! It is also close to Tawas Gateway Park and Tawas City Park, and it is located along the scenic bike path. This 2 bedroom cottage, named for its adorable moose decorations, has a large fenced off grassy yard which is great for the kids to safely play in and there is also an area of sand in the yard which leads right out into Lake Huron. The frontage varies as the rise and fall of Lake Huron so consider it a rocky frontage, that has sand in the yard fire pit area. The kitchen which is white in color and has large sun filled windows which give a very serene feel along with the living room with its knotty pine walls very cozy. If you are looking for a comfortable yet exciting vacation spot, you've found it!

This property is so amazing!  Year round property especially spectacular Fall Colors, Hiking Trails, or for the winter snow enthusiasts, blaze your own Cross country ski trail such a beautiful area in Oscoda/Mikado. Secluded woods, in a peaceful environment, this would be the ideal place to get away from the hussle of life! This 3400 sq ft. home is immaculate with all the needs you would have on vacation and the view is absolutely breath taking! You can sit out on the covered balcony with a warm cup of coffee and watch nature unfold before your eyes! With 120 acres of lush green forest, landscaped with rippling brooks and open ranges, this is a hikers dream! There are groomed hiking trails winding through the whole forest that take you to mystical adventures, end at the Pine River and wrap back around to a beautiful fish stocked (catch and release only), pond with a glowing water fountain. Away from the noise of the city and surrounded by the starlit sky, this is the ideal place for a wonderful bonfire, cross country skiing, nature hiking and just plain relaxing!  You must see and experience this for yourself!

xprop.longdesc:
What an adventure! From this Michigan White Pine & Cedar home on Lake Huron, as you relax on 80 feet of Sandy beach, you can see White Stone Point to the north, Point Lookout to the south and the Charity Islands to the east. Sunrises over the lake, walks along the beach and star-lit nights are free of charge ;o) and on a clear day, you can see the historic Charity Island Lighthouse and freighter activity along the horizon!  With vaulted ceilings, open floor plan, cozy screened lakeside porch and a pool table, there is room for everyone without feeling crowded. There are local boat launch areas nearby and  golf courses such as Huron Breeze Golf Course & Restaurant and Knollview. The fun and R&R options are endless! Ceiling fans sway the Lake's breezes through the open windows and throughout the home. In the fall and winter, enjoy the colors, views of the icy bay, brisk beach walks, cross-country skiing and more. This beautiful home is warm, inviting and ready to welcome you.

Grand View Cabin 2 is the second of eight different cabins at The Grand View Resort. This Cabin is a 2 bedroom, 1 bath home on Grand Lake. Cabin 2 comes equipped with full kitchen, living room and a huge deck! The interior of the home is that of a modern cabin, with a glass top dinner table and a bar and bar stools.  All of the homes at Grand View come with their own gas grill and picnic table for your dining enjoyment.  There is also plenty of yard space for the kids to play on. There is also a shared row boat at the resort for guests to use for fishing and lake fun if they are not being used.  You would need to bring your own fishing poles but the lake provides the fish!
WIRELESS INTERNET & CABLE TV is provided as a convenience only & is not integral to the contract.

Bed Configurations:
1 Full (Bedroom 1), 1 Full (Bedroom 2), 1 Sofa Sleeper (Living Room)

xprop.longdesc:
Paradise can be found on Lake Huron with this 2,500+ square foot home.  A short distance to a sugar sand beach where you can fully enjoy all Lake Huron has to offer. This home has 2 family rooms and 4 bedrooms that will comfortably sleep 12 guests. During the day, you are able to relax on the beach or for evening entertainment there is a cozy fire pit perfect for roasting marshmallows. There is a basketball hoop for the sports lover and a relaxing balcony to read your favorite book. There is no TV or Cable, but you will not miss it! Relax, unplug, unwind! This location has the makings to be a perfect vacation spot for you and your family to reconnect.

Bed Configurations:
1 Queen (Bedroom 1), 2 Twin Beds (Bedroom 2), 2 Bunk Beds (Bedroom 3), 1 Twin with Trundle (Bedroom 4), 1 Queen Sofa Sleeper (Living Room), 1 Full Futon (Upstairs Lounge Room)

xprop.shortdesc: Boardwalk Beach #1 - Beach House - Lake Huron Resort - Oscoda
xprop.shortsum: 2 Bed / 1 Bath / Sleeps 6 / No Pets / 3 Night Min
xprop.amenlist: Amenities:|A/C Unit|Linens|Towels|General Amenities:|Ceiling Fan|No Phone|Outdoor Grill Type-Gas|Outdoor Shared Firepit|Sandy Beach|Small Appliances-Coffee Pot|Small Appliances-Microwave|Small Appliances-Toaster|TV Type - Basic Cable|Kitchen / Dining:|Dishes Utensils|Kitchen|Location Type:|Lake Front|Lake Huron Waterfront|Outdoor:|Deck|Hammock|Lawn Chairs|Picnic Table|Suitability:|Pets Not Allowed|Smoking Not Allowed
xprop.ratesinfo: Base Rate + 6% Sales Tax + $40 cleaning fee
xprop.longdesc:
Come see this dream resort! Layed out with 3 adorable, uniquely decorated, A-frame cabins on 125 feet of sugar sand beach, this resort is perfect for a family reunion (up to 18 people if you rent all 3 cabins) or a romantic getaway. Each cabin has 2 bedrooms, a high efficiency air conditioning unit, a warm and cozy gas fireplace, plenty of room for 6 to sleep, ample outdoor furniture along with a private grill and a view to take your breath away! Play football or frisbee on the beach or sunbathe on the sand with a good book. Dive into the fresh waters of Lake Huron or hike along the shoreline for miles while taking in the summer breeze. This cabin is #1 and is called the Beach House, it is the first unit you see which is next to Unit # 2. It is complete with knotty pine walls and a beach inspired theme that brings the cabin to life and creates a peaceful atmosphere for relaxing and enjoying the Up North experience!

Bed Configurations:  
1 Full (Bedroom 1), 1 Full (Bedroom 2), 1 Futon (Living Room)

This cabin is #3  and is called the Boat House and is located closest to the water, next to #2.  It is complete with knotty pine walls, and a boat inspired theme that brings the cabin to life and creates a peaceful atmosphere for relaxing and enjoying the Up North experience!

1 Full (Bedroom 1), 1 Full (Bedroom 2), 1 Futon (Living Room)

xprop.longdesc:
What an amazing place! This 3 bedroom home with Apartment is set back from any neighbors at the end of a paved road.  It is perfectly perched on 2 lakes with wonderful views of both and spreads across 4 acres of land. The unique feature about this 1,600+ square foot, air conditioned home is that you can watch the sun rise and set all from the same spot. It rises over Floyd Lake and sets over Sand Lake! What a great place to spread out and enjoy a fun and memorable vacation. A very nice fire pit with abundant seating and a large child's play set decorate the backyard and offer entertainment for fun filled days and nights. The main home is a 3 bedroom home (sleeps 6). The Apartment above the garage (sleeps 10).  The apartment includes a kitchenette, 1 bedroom, 1 bath with shower, a pool table and an air conditioning unit in the apartment window. The home itself has central air in the back bedroom and bathroom and an air conditioning unit in the living room. On top of all of this, it also has 2 covered porches with outdoor tables and seating as an option to escape the sun's rays after a day on the lakes. This is a child's paradise with toys, books, coloring books, leggos, child friendly sippy cups, 2 pack n' plays, outdoor play set, merry go' round, castle playset and so much more! Occasionally, the homeowner may be on the premises, in the upper home only, for guest privacy and will not be accessing the shorelines or fire pit area. There are great outdoor amenities including the grill, fire pit, beach, dock and lots of parking, etc. You have to come and try this place out and don't forget bring fishing poles for great fishing on either lake! Access Floyd Lake from the National Forest boat launch (with free parking and an outhouse) from Saginaw Street. For Four wheeler and snowmobiler enthusiast , ORV trails are about 1.5 miles away. Apartment closes for the season annually October 30th. However the main house is open year round but only available to rent off season Oct-30- May 15th.

The home is on Floyd lake, but this beautiful property also extends to Sand Lake take the new nature trail to Sand Lake for the best of both worlds fishing on Floyd lake and swimming in Sand Lake.

Monthly rates September-May 3 months or more 900 plus utilties. subject to approval just ASK

Home - 1 Queen (Bedroom 1), 1 Queen (Bedroom 2), 1 Queen (Bedroom 3)
Apartment - 2 Bunk Beds and 1 Twin with trundle (Bedroom 4), 2 Full Futons (Living Room)

xprop.shortdesc: Steps in the City-Residential-East Tawas
xprop.shortsum: 1 Bedroom / 1 Bath / Sleeps 4 / Pet Friendly / 2 Night Min
xprop.amenlist: Amenities:|A/C Unit|Air Conditioning|Linens|Towels|Wi-Fi|Entertainment:|Dvd|Internet TV|General Amenities:|Balcony|Bath Tub|Ceiling Fan|Crockpot|Drive Way-Paved|Fenced in Backyard|Fully Furnished|Furniture Type-Sofa bed|Limited Parking 3 Autos Max|No Cats Allowed|No Phone|Open All Year Around|Small Appliances-Blender|Small Appliances-Coffee Pot|Small Appliances-Microwave|TV Type - Basic Cable|Kitchen / Dining:|Dishes Utensils|Gas Stove|Kitchen|Oven|Refrigerator|Stove|Outdoor:|Fire pit|Lawn Chairs|Patio|Pool / Spa:|Hot Tub|Suitability:|Pets Considered|Smoking Not Allowed
xprop.ratesinfo: Base Rate + 6% Sales Tax + $55 Cleaning Fee
xprop.longdesc:
Soak in the hot tub in your private backyard, enjoy the 50" flat screen in the living room, or head downtown, to the park and beach! Whether you're looking for a quiet retreat or an action-packed adventure, your private 1 bedroom apartment nestled atop the homeowner's cheery red barn garage is the perfect getaway.

Located in charming East Tawas, one block from all the action on Newman Street, the East Tawas Pier park and beautiful Lake Huron's sandy beach. You'll be smiling as everyone else fights for parking! You're right in town for everything; pizza places and other restaurants, the nostalgic movie theater, ice cream parlors and fudge, bars with live music, eclectic shops and more. Yet, despite its convenient location, the neighborhood is quiet and relaxing when you want to take a break. In the evenings, whether you're sitting by the fire pit in the yard, or star gazing from your balcony, you'll be able to hear the faint sound of music during events at the Pier. At dusk on Tuesdays, you can hear a little live music on Newman street during their block party, if you aren't there to see it yourself!

Let's take a virtual tour! Drive right up to the red barn (your space fits 2 cars, one behind the other), and walk through the white arbor into a little garden courtyard. Your worries are required to be left behind at this point! Walk through the red gate next to the stairway and you'll find your very own, fully fenced, private backyard featuring a delicious hot tub for 4-5! We have it heating for your arrival, but you can adjust it if you need it hotter, so it will be ready by the time you've unpacked and settled in! At night, there is a fun lighting module in it that you can control with a remote. In the yard, you'll also find 4 adarondack chairs around a fire pit, a dining set for 4 under a little gazebo, and a swing for 2 with an awning. The yard has beautiful trees and flowering purple wisteria early in the season. Your furry family members will have a ton of fun here too.

Coming out of the yard, turn right and follow the flight of bright red, wooden steps to find your large balcony overlooking the quaint neighborhood and your yard below. The balcony features 2 wrought iron style benches that seat 2 people on each, made comfy with seat cushions and back pillows, and a small table for refreshments. Open the front door to find a large, bright, airy apartment, stylishly decorated with a contemporary feel. It will be fresh and ultra-clean upon your arrival. Your full kitchen including a fridge and freezer with ice maker, gas range and oven, microwave, coffee maker, toaster, blender, slow cooker, hot air popcorn popper, dishes, utensils, cookware and more. Enjoy family meals and game nights at your rattan dining table for 4 in the center of it all. You're always a part of the fun; the apartment has an open layout, so whether you're cooking, eating or lounging around watching tv, you can be together.

The kitchen, dining and living area is equipped with an air conditioner/heater combo unit as well as a main furnace we turn on in the Fall, has great natural light from the windows - including a large picture window - ample seating and stylish decor. In the living area your entertainment includes board games, books, WIFI (no phone service is provided - bring your smart phone), a 50" flat screen TV with HBO and other cable channels like A&E, USA, TNT, ESPN, CNN, TBS, etc., and a DVD player. There is additional heat from the electric fireplace console. To create a cozy ambiance, use the fireplace without heat! You'll also find 2 sofas that convert to XL twin beds (not quite full size, larger than twin), a large coffee table for eating and playing games, a ceiling fan above the sitting/sleeping area to keep you cool, and a desk for writing postcards or catching up on a little work.

The large, separate master bedroom in the back of the unit is equipped with its own air conditioner. The comfortable queen bed is outfitted with a down-alternative all-season comforter encased in a duvet that is washed after every guest. You'll find 2 separate clothing closets, an iron and ironing board, a 24" TV equipped with cable channels and HBO, a dresser with drawers, and a ceiling fan. It also features a sitting area with 2 large chairs and a little foot rest, with a little book nook and lamp, and a faux electric wood stove that can heat or just be used for the flame ambiance. You'll find peace and tranquility in the decor, especially the butterfly flower garden wall! (You'll have to see it to believe it!)

The apartment has a separate full bathroom with bathtub and shower, including a waterfall shower head, so people don't have to walk into your bedroom to make use of it. It is stylishly decorated to give you a spa feel, and has towels for 4.

We hope you enjoyed the tour and decide that Steps in the city is the right choice for you!

1 Queen (Bedroom), 2 Twin Sofa Sleepers (Living Room)

xprop.longdesc:
This wonderful cottage is a perfect place to relax and enjoy Lake Ogemaw Inland Lake. Sit on the back porch swing and watch the sunset over the lake. Bonfires and s'mores await you on a moonlit beach! Enjoy the beautiful starlit sky away from the city lights, step inside to enjoy Cable TV and check your emails on the internet. This 2 bedroom home has ample sleeping room for 6. This year round  home is great for a couple, or a whole family or a guys/girl's weekend!  This home has a fully equipped kitchen, you will not need to bring anything. Dogs are allowed so you can bring your four-legged friend too!

Lake Ogemaw is an all sports lake with fishing, swimming and boating. For those looking to shop or look around, the Outlet Mall and West Branch Cinema are close by for your entertainment. Go tubing or canoeing on the nearby Rifle River. The hills of Ogemaw County are breathtaking when it come to beautiful fall colors! In the winter, ice fishing and snowmobiling are available most winters while the Ogemaw Hills Pathway provides well groomed trails for cross country skiing.
For other activities and local attractions, visit www.visitwestbranch.com/funshtml#attractions

Monthly Off Season rates and terms are subject to approval.

Gorgeous! Waterfront home on the west side of Cedar Lake with 75 feet of private sandy beach, a boat dock and in-ground fire pit.  Large living room with 60" HDTV with DVR, vaulted ceilings and french doors that lead out to a quiet, covered deck that overlooks the scenic, all sports Cedar lake.  Sit and enjoy the view rain or shine. This home has a bright open kitchen with built in dishwasher & appliances.  It comes complete with an elegant dining area with vaulted ceiling, hardwood floors and a large, beautiful bay window overlooking the back yard and wooded lot.  Picturesque views of the lake from the master bedroom with a private full bath.  Skylights in both bathrooms, large laundry room with extra storage & second refrigerator.  This home is located half mile north of Lakewood  Shores Golf Course and not far from Springport Hills, White Pine, Red Hawk and several others golf courses.  Cedar Lake has swimming, canoeing, kayaking, boating and fishing and is close to the AuSable River,  VanEtten Lake, Lake Huron and Huron National Forest, along with several state parks for summer and winter sports.  You can launch your boat at the cement boat launch at the Public Park located inside of Lakewood Shores.    For those that want to enjoy shopping, great dining or other activities, come visit the City of Oscoda, Harrisville and or Tawas.  
HIGH SPEED WIRELESS INTERNET & CABLE TV is provided as a convenience only & is not integral to the contract.

Cozy Cove is located on Tawas Point, the only cape in the Midwest. Watch the falling stars at night while enjoying a blazing fire at the fire pit, this property is so close to Tawas State Park where you can enjoy miles of Lake Huron Sandy Beach! Also enjoy the fantastic birding and butterfly migrations. Tawas Point is a small east coast-like community where time has stood still. You can even stay warm year round with a ventless fireplace. Once here, you won't want to leave!

This is a 2 bedroom, 2 bath ranch home with 100 feet of  Lake Huron frontage in Black River Michigan.  This home is 1500 square feet with central air, surrounded by quiet serenity. There are 2 living rooms, a recently remodeled kitchen with gorgeous views of the lake. Black River is located 25 minutes south of Alpena and 35 minutes north of Oscoda. Harrisville is a small, quaint town within a 10 minute drive; it features attractions such as the Sturgeon Point Light House and Cedar brook Trout Farm for kids (Located 5 minutes south of the property) are Ice Cream shops, yum!

For the Nature lovers 4-5 miles from the home there are miles of Trailhead (Alcona ORV Trail (29.3 miles) & Bull Gap Trail (100 miles) located between Oscoda and Black River as well as two State Forest Camp Grounds (Harrisville & Negwegon State Park that has walking trails 2-3 miles of undeveloped beach). The Alcona Trail is only 40 minutes away. Also located 3 miles north is a boat launch on the Black River that feeds into Lake Huron and is great for Fishing. Pet friendly (dog only).

xprop.ratesinfo: Base Rate + 6% Sales Tax + $80 Cleaning Fee
xprop.longdesc:
This beautifully appointed, upscale home is located on scenic Van Etten Lake in Oscoda, Michigan. Van Etten Lake is a year round, all-sports lake perfect for fishing, boating, waterskiing, canoeing, jet skiing, ice fishing, snowmobiling, kayaking, etc. You can tie your boat up on your private dock while you clean your catch of the day, which could be walleye, northern pike, bass, perch or any of the other various pan fish in the lake. Relax dockside in your comfortable Adirondack chair while watching the colorful sunsets atop the lake and roasting your marshmallows, s'mores or hot dogs over your modern fire pit. End your day of dreams with a swim in the crystal clear waters of sandy bottomed Van Etten Lake. The upscale home is a fully furnished and includes a Culligan reverse osmosis water purification system, central air and Wi Fi  all of the amenities you would need to make your visit both comfortable as well as memorable. Two fully furnished bedrooms provide magnificent, sleeping areas with new queen size beds new linens and new Berber carpets. If you need a little more space, the fully furnished living room includes the comforts of a queen size pull out bed. Cook your fresh fish in the fully appointed kitchen with the added amenities of an omelet maker, waffle maker and bread maker. Each room has a ceiling fan for your comfort. Property is near Lumberman's Monument, scenic Au Sable River, the shores of Lake Huron, as well as canoe rentals. Also nearby are grocery stores, pharmacies and restaurants. Free concerts in downtown Oscoda, playground equipment, as well as ice cream parlors to complete your dream vacation at Socrates Place on beautiful Van Etten Lake. Owner occupies the front home, but this home has its own entrance and walk way to the lake. If you're fortunate enough the homeowner may be around and inclined to take you on an exploration of Van Etten lake on their pontoon. You are sure enjoy the personal touches of this vacation rental home.

 

Bed Configuration: 1 Queen (Bedroom 1), 1 Queen (Bedroom 2), 1 Queen Sleeper Sofa (Living Room)

 **Depending on the natural occurrence of lake levels they may be higher or lower than photographed. We do our best to post the most accurate photos.

 

For your reading enjoyment, please visit owners own website at: www.socratesplace.com

xprop.longdesc:
Come out to Sugar Springs and enjoy the Hilltop View.  You'll find something for every outdoor lover near this beautiful 5 bedroom, 2 bath home.  Close by is Lake Lancer, and Lake Lancelot, for those wanting to be on the water, you'll have optimum space with over 1000 surface acres between the two, where you can go fishing for bass, walleye, northern pike and pan fish.  These clean and clear lakes, are tested and treated several times a year, are also perfect for swimming, sailing and skiing with boat docks and launches located along the shore lines. Just bring your boat and enjoy!

If golfing is more your speed, you can wonder down to the Sugar Springs Golf Course.  With a 3 star rating and being named one of the 25 Best Public Courses in Michigan, why wouldn't you want to check out this 18-hole greenway?  Golfer of all ages and skill levels are welcome and find the course very delightful.  It is a reasonable walking course, but golf carts are also available. Green fees are posted at the golf course.

Want to rent a pontoon? Here is that info to call for details Sugar Springs Marine on Sugar River Rd 989-246-0281

After you've enjoyed all that Sugar Springs has to offer, check out The Hearth restaurant.  They also offer breakfast and lunch, so don't limit yourself to just their delightful dinners!

Following your day on the lake or green, come back home and enjoy some quality time with your family.  If you aren't quite ready to call it a night in front of the TV, play some horseshoes or take pleasure in a fire out in the backyard.  When you are ready for bed, turn down the lights and enjoy the stars from your Hilltop View.

Additional information about Sugar Springs can be found at the website below:
http://www.sugarsprings.net/aboutsugarspring.html

Offering the most secluded retreat with 15 acres of land that is surrounded by Huron National Forest; it's the perfect opportunity to connect with family and friends. Check out the loft area great for playing cards or use the downstairs Poker table! This place is over 3200 square feet there is room for everyone comfortably. The kitchen is built for those who love to cook! Huge Refridgerator and warming drawer along with a spare 2nd refridgerator you can bring all the food you'd love to cook. There are many outdoor activities if you chose to partake in from nature walks (take your GPS remember you are surrounded by Huron National Forest) to fishing in the catch and release pond, or watch for Coyotes, fox or Squirrels, Deer or perhaps you may even see a Bear! Although there is no hunting allowed on this property you can hunt on Federal Land near by.  There is even a shooting range for those that have a legal permit to carry, you can sight in a gun or perhaps target shooting,  there is also  a horseshoe pit and an outdoor fire pit with a screen top to keep the embers at a minimum. Truly a spacious private rental! Rest assured there's plenty of mother nature to take in when you're Away From It All!

*Cell service may be limited in this area.

Limited Parking: 5 cars max

xprop.longdesc:
Location and room for everyone is what this home is about! This vastly unique, beautiful property  location on Lake Huron out near Tawas Point  has a main home, 3 individual cabins all on a private 100 x 500 foot treed lot.  The Main Home and Cabin 1 are up front on Lake Huron while the other 2 cabins are located behind the main home.  Talk about a great place for kids to play with such a nice large yard or venture out into the water just down a few stairs off from a large deck. The main home has 3 bedrooms and 1 bath with spacious living room and a luxurious deck. There is also a TV with cable provided only in the main house. You can all gather during the day around cabin 1 which includes a kitchen and 1/2 bath all in a rustic and timeless log cabin. Perfect for BBQ and family get-together with its large enclosed sun porch and bar area that overlooks Lake Huron.  You will not miss TV in the cabins since you are able to enjoy star gazing or sunrises right from either the outdoor patio or enclosed sunroom. Just before the main home is a yellow charming rustic 2 bedroom 1 bath cabin with 2 single beds and 1 full bed. Also there is a living room, dining area and full kitchen. Last is the first red rustic cabin right off the main road which is a 2 bedroom 1 bath comfortable and roomy lodging with a double bunk bed and full bed. This cottage also has a living room, dining room and kitchen. This Great Escape gives up to 18 guests plenty of room for outdoor activities offering the ability to enjoy time together yet still have some privacy by retreating to your own cabin.  This place will definitely become a favorite of yours!

Limited Parking:  7 cars max

This comfortable and cozy yet modern cottage still maintains that Up North feel you'd expect, nice open living space between the kitchen and living room, this knotty pine home also includes a  sun room that faces the side yard. Plenty of space for everyone to spread out and relax. The beautiful beach is just a short distance away and ready for all to enjoy.  Gather around the fire pit for an evening of fun,  roast a hot dog or two :)  Home is located on a side road, away from the noise of traffic.   Al's place is the perfect place to kick back and enjoy the surrounding beauty. This cottage is only located about 3 miles from the North Port Marina where daily and weekly boat slips can be rented as well.  And if you have more than four people, Anna's place across the street sleeps 5, check with us for availability.
